substitution.copyText: '' So frown'd he once, when in angry Parle | '' He smote the sleaded Pollax on the ice | 'Tis strange.
Mar. Pray sit down and tell me he that knows,
substitution.amendedText: Mar. Pray tell me he that knows,

substitution.copyText: '' And with such daily cost of brasen Cannon, | '' And foreign Mart for implements of war? | '' Why such impress of ship-wrights, whose sore task | '' Does not divide the Sunday from the week? '' What might be toward, that this sweaty haste
But look, the morn in ruffet mantle clad
substitution.amendedText: Hor: - But look, the morn in ruffet mantle clad

substitution.copyText: '' Do you consent we shall acquaint him with it, | As needful in our loves, fitting our duty?
